description:
From trail days to base camp, a good hatchet is an invaluable tool. Whether choked up in the choils for detail work or rocked back on the handle for maximum chopping power, the Gerber Pack Hatchet won’t disappoint.

  • Rubber over-moulded grip and deep finger choils provide a sure grip
  • Full-tang construction adds rigidity and strength
  • Tall blade grind provides a durable edge
  • Lanyard loop on the axe and belt loops on the sheath give you multiple carry options
  • Rugged nylon sheath protects your hatchet and you
name: Gerber Pack Hatchet
